<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E1.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\begin{split}\displaystyle{\hat{{H}}}&\displaystyle={\omega_{\mathrm{r}}}{\hat%

{\sigma}_{\mathrm{z}1}}+{\hat{\sigma}_{\mathrm{z}2}}){\hat{a}^{\dagger}\hat{a}%

&\displaystyle+\epsilon(t)({\hat{a}^{\dagger}}e^{-i{\omega_{\mathrm{d}}}t}+{%
\mathrm{h.c.}}).\end{split}" display="block"><mtable columnspacing="0pt" displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="right"><mover accent="true"><mi>H</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mrow><mi/><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><msub><mi>ω</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mover accent="true"><mi>a</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover><mo>†</mo></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mover accent="true"><mi>a</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mfrac><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>a</mtext></msub><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mover accent="true"><mi>σ</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover><mi>z1</mi></msub></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mfrac><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>a</mtext></msub><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mover accent="true"><mi>σ</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover><mi>z2</mi></msub></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi>χ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><msub><mover accent="true"><mi>σ</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover><mi>z1</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mover accent="true"><mi>σ</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover><mi>z2</mi></msub></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mover accent="true"><mi>a</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover><mo>†</mo></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mover accent="true"><mi>a</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd/><mtd columnalign="left"><mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>ϵ</mi><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mover accent="true"><mi>a</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover><mo>†</mo></msup><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>ω</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>
